channel.title: Auto Members
channel.description: Hi, Im Using Figmentscape V4.5 And I Got A Question How Can I Make It so When Some 1 Logs In They Get Members So Staff Members Don't Have To Do It.

item.title: Auto Members
item.dc:creator: @I_Buck_I I Buck I
item.description:
@I_Buck_I wrote:

[QUOTE=Barrage™;72820]Difficulty: 2/10
Files Modified: Client.java and player.java
Server Source: Tested on Figmentscape v4
Purpose: Making members upon login/ Auto membership.
Credits : 100% Barrage™

Ok i wanted to make this tutorial because…because i have seen so much threads about
auto members asking so here it is…i hope you leave great feed back no flame please,
so yeah i hope you all enjoy and have a nice day

[i]Step 1.

Open up your client.java and search for.

checkmembers();

It should look like this.

checkmembers(); if(checkmembers() == 5) playerIsMember = 1; if(checkmembers() == 0) playerIsMember = 0;

Replace it with this code

checkmembers(); if(checkmembers() == 5) playerIsMember = 1; if(checkmembers() == 0) playerIsMember = 1;

What did i just do?:
Replaced the 0 with a 1.

Now open up player.java in your source and search for this.

playerIsMember = 0;

Replace theplayerIsMember = 0;
WithplayerIsMember = 1;

What did i just do?
Replaced the 0 with the 1 again.

Now in your source again go to compile
or compile and run witch ever you use as
a compiler, or if you type c for compile any ways go to compile
double click it then once you have compiled and it has come up

[b]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Files compiled Successfully!
Press any ket to continue…

or what ever click Run.bat and you are done
test it with a account thats not admin/mod/member
and see if it has got member abiltys witch it will

Thanks, Barrage™

[/b]Feed my pet if you want XD[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
